Policy Watch

Track financial regulations and policy changes that may impact your portfolio

Financial Policy Updates
Filter
Recent regulatory changes and their potential impact on your investments

RBI Increases Repo Rate by 25 bps

The Reserve Bank of India has increased the repo rate by 25 basis points to 5.75%, citing persistent inflationary pressures.

Impact on Your Portfolio:

Your home loan EMI will increase by approximately ₹1,520 per month. Fixed deposit returns will improve slightly.

Banking
Real Estate
High Impact
June 15, 2025

SEBI Tightens Mutual Fund Expense Ratio Rules

SEBI has announced new regulations capping total expense ratios (TER) for equity mutual funds at 2.25%, down from the previous 2.5%.

Impact on Your Portfolio:

Your annual mutual fund expenses will decrease by approximately ₹2,500, slightly improving long-term returns.

Mutual Funds
Asset Management
Medium Impact
June 10, 2025

New Crypto Taxation Framework Announced

The government has introduced a revised taxation framework for cryptocurrency transactions, reducing TDS from 1% to 0.1%.

Impact on Your Portfolio:

Your crypto transaction costs will decrease, potentially saving you ₹9,000 annually based on your trading volume.

Cryptocurrency
Taxation
Medium Impact
June 5, 2025

Budget 2025: LTCG Tax Rate Increased

The Finance Minister has proposed increasing the Long Term Capital Gains tax rate from 10% to 12.5% for equity investments.

Impact on Your Portfolio:

Your tax liability on equity investments held for over 1 year will increase by approximately ₹5,000 annually.

Taxation
Equity Markets
High Impact
May 28, 2025
